results.name: Inverse permutation of A163235.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4095
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (define (A001477bi x y) (/ (+ (expt (+ x y) 2) x (* 3 y)) 2))
def A(x, y): return (((x + y)**2) + x + 3*y)//2
def a059905(n): return sum([(n>>2*i&1)<<i for i in range(int(len(bin(n)[2:])//2) + 1)])
return sum([x[2*i + 1]*2**i for i in range(len(x)//2)])
print([a(n) for n in range(101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 25 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2009
